string.value: Eileen here! Thanks to Maple Chat, I get to talk to my friends allll day, even when I'm eating! You should get some friends and chat it up, just like me!
Eileen here! I love how fashionable everybody is here. I plan on giving all of my Likability points to the person with the fanciest outfit.
Eileen here! Did you know that you can chat with your friends while you hunt?
Eileen here! Do you know who the Black Mage's new Commander is? Because I forgot already.
Eileen here! My friend told me there was a Pink Mushroom around Leafre! I must have it.
Eileen here! I started eating tomatoes for breakfast. Is that weird? I don't even care, because I love them.
Eileen here! Have you ever seen a Yeti couple? They're so fluffy, it makes me want to explode!
Eileen here! I can't even begin to tell you how great this new job is. I haven't had to pick fish guts out of my hair for a week now!
Eileen here! When I was little, my grandpa said the gods shook a mouse and made Maple World. Now that I'm older, I think my grandpa may have been crazy.
Eileen here! Don't be surprised if you see me on the big screen one day. I've got everything a gal needs: a great smile, a sweet temper, and a good sense of humor.
Eileen here! How come this Black Mage guy gets to expand his influence all over Maple World? Maybe I should do that...
Eileen here! Did you know that you can chat with your friends while you hunt?
Eileen here! Have you heard about the Black Mage's new commander? She's supposed to be super creepy.
Eileen here! My friend told me there was a Pink Mushroom around Leafre! I must have it.
Eileen here! I started eating tomatoes for breakfast. Is that weird? I don't even care, because I love them.
Eileen here! Have you ever seen a Yeti couple? They're so fluffy, it makes me want to explode!
Eileen here! I am so excited that I got this job. I used to be a dish-washer at a crab shack and it was NOT great.
Eileen here! How come this Black Mage guy gets to expand his influence all over Maple World? Maybe I should do that...
Eileen here! When I was little, my grandpa said the gods shook a mouse and made Maple World. Now that I'm older, I think my grandpa may have been crazy.
